tips: Logging out to the Character Selection screen and back in is a great way to go back to town for free (risky for the first hour of the league)
You don't need to talk to NPCs to get quests
One Man tag: Hit boss with everyone not in instance, port in, easy 1 man boss
Skitter bots slow mobs and shock(15%damage)
Leaving Izaro lieutenants alive gives you more keys at the end
At level 50 and over, do all vaal side areas for 6-links, you can change colors in crafting bench
Don't obsess over every drop, prioritize sockets and links
7 vaal gems + sacrifice fragment = Vaal orb, with Vaal Orbs you can vaal your skills
Molten shell is a very good skill to vaal
Essences are good for easy leveling crafting
Sell to the vendor a Rustic Sash (magic or rare) + Blacksmith Whetstone + weapon = Magic same weapon type with (40 to 64%) Increased Physical Damage
Sell to the vendor a Chain Belt (magix or rare) + Blacksmith Whetstone + Dagger/Sceptre/Staff/Wand = Magic  same weapon with (10 to 29%) Increased Spell Damage

Sell to a vendor Magic Sceptre/Wand/Rune Dagger + Ruby Ring(for Fire Damage) or Topaz Ring(for Lightning Damage) or Sapphire Ring(for Cold Damage) + Orb of Alteration = Weapon with with added x to x Lightning/Fire/Cold Damage to Spells
Sell to a vendor White Boots + Any rarity Quicksilver Flask + Orb of Augmentation = Magic Boots with 10% increased Movement Speed
Sell to a vendor Magic or Rare Boots with +X% Movement Speed + Any rarity Quicksilver Flask + Orb of Augmentation = Magic Boots with (original value)+5% increased Movement Speed

steps: On the The Twilight Strand kill first mob ➞ Hillock
The Coast don't kill anything ➞ Mud flats (don't forget the ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint)
Mud flats get the 3xGlyphs then ➞ The Submerged Passage
The Submerged Passage get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint, take ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint back to The Coast ➞ The Tidal Island
The Tidal Island kill Hailrake get Medicine Chest, ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to go back to town
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Submerged Passage
The Submerged Passage look for long staircase or bridge
Leave ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal at staircase or bridge ➞ The Ledge
The Ledge, ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to town, use ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal you left at the staircase or bridge
Go right of staircase for The Flooded depths
Find and kill The Deep Dweller then log out
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Ledge ➞ The Climb
The Climb (3 stalagmites side of waypoint points to exit) you don't really need the ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The Lower Prison
The Lower Prison take ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint , do trial on first level ➞ The Lower Prison ➞ The Upper Prison kill Brutus, log out
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to Prisoner's Gate ➞ The Ship Graveyard ➞ The Ship Graveyard Cave and leave a ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal in front
Find The Cavern of Wrath ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to town
Take your ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal (just entering the The Cavern of Wrath completes the quest)
Enter The Ship Graveyard Cave get the AllFlame and log out
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Ship Graveyard then find and kill Fairgraves, log out
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint The Cavern of Wrath ➞ kill Merveil ➞ Act 2
tips: There's a crafting recipe after Brutus, but it is not worth picking up
Look for 3-link wands at vendor and +1 skill gem type you are using
Look for movement speed boots at vendor by using the search function, searching 'nn', thanks to /u/Door2doorcalgary for bring this up
Pick up all small blues to vendor for alteration shards
Wait until level ~10-12 for league mechanics
Don't use chest armor, chest armor slow your movement speed
Tri-color tri-link gives you a chromatic orb when sold to vendor
It is worth killing blue mobs groups early, but not rare mobs as they give little experience compared to the time it takes to kill
Frostblink is better than dash in many cases because it does damage

steps: The Southern forest ➞ Town
In town, head North East to The Old fields find and leave a ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal outside The Den then ➞ The Crossroads
The Crossroads ➞ ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to town and take the ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal you left outside The Den
Go in The Den and Kill The Great White Beast then log out
Turn in The Great White Beast then ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Crossroads ➞ North to The Chamber of Sins
In The Chamber of Sins, get the ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint, the waypoint points in direction of the next level
The Chamber of Sins level 2 do the trial it is most likely north, Find the long hallway, kill Fidelitas get the Baleful Gem then log out
Get Herald reward if no herald good for your build get Summon Skitter Bots, check vendors ,![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Crossroads ➞ South to The Fellshrine Ruins
Find The Crypt, The Crypt loops around ➞ trial then log out, The Riverways do Einhar's quest, get red beast ➞ The Western Forest

The Western Forest get the ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint (Alira is always the same side oft he road than ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint and The Weaver's Chamber on opposite side)
Find and ➞ The Weaver's Chamber and kill The weaver then log out
Get Support Gem reward and use ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Crossroads go north to The Broken Bridge, follow path , try find red beast if you didn't do it earlier
Kill Kraitlin log out then back in , go to The Riverways , follow path north ➞ The Wetlands
The Wetlands kill Oak and get the ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint just north, ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Western Forest and help Allira
Then find the path, follow it to Arteri, kill him and get the Thaumetic Emblem, log out
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to Act 1 get passive point reward and check vendor, ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint back to Act 2 town then The Wetlands ➞ The Vaal ruins
The Vaal ruins ➞ The Northern Forest ➞ The caverns find and ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to town vendor and check vendors
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint The caverns ➞ find The Ancient Pyramid and kill Vaal Oversoul (dont forget crafting)
Log out, vendor then ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to Act 3
tips: Still better not to use chest armor
Look for movement speed boots at vendor by using the search function, searching 'nn'
Doing Einhar's quest gives you a chance to beast craft a unique (because of the smaller pool of unique items to choose from, you have a higher chance to get a Tabula)
You can start doing the league mechanic now
It is worth going back to Act 1 sometimes, to check vendors at beginning of Act 2
If you check vendors in Act 1, [Waypoint] back to Act 2 town, so when you log out you are saved in Act 2 not 1
You can vendor Armourer's Scrap for Scrolls of Identification

steps: Go north help Clarissa dont forget to wait for her
In town ➞ The Slums ➞ The Crematorium, ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to menagerie for unique
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint The Crematorium trial kill Piety pick up Tolman's Bracelet log out
Talk to Clarissa for Sewer Keys, run back to The Slums ➞ The Sewers
Get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint and 3xPlatinum ➞ The Marketplace ➞ The Catacombs do trial log out
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint The Marketplace ➞ The Battlefront normally opposite of The Catacombs
The Battlefront get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint and The Ribbon Spool ➞ The Docks (if level 23 or less ➞ The Solaris Temple )
Get Thaumetic Sulphite log out, turn in quests check vendors
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint The Battlefront north ➞ The Solaris Temple get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The Solaris Temple level 2 turn in The Ribbon Spool
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint The Sewers get Crafting ➞ The Ebony Barracks
Kill General Gravicius (very rippy) ➞ The Lunaris Temple
The Lunaris Temple dont kill Kole get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The Lunaris Temple level 2
The Lunaris Temple level 2 look for easy skips,
Paths 1 cart = right way, 2 carts = wrong way to avoid dying to Tentacle Miscreation keep moving
Kill Piety get Crafting and log out
Turn in quests ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint The Ebony Barracks ➞ The Imperial Gardens
The Imperial Gardens get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint north ➞ The Library , get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ Loose Candle ➞ The Archives
Get 4xGolden Pages log out, ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Library

![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint The Imperial Gardens do trial get Crafting, ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint Aspirant's plaza
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint The Imperial Gardens ➞ The Sceptre of God ➞ The Upper Sceptre of God kill Dominus
The Upper Sceptre of God ➞ The Aqueduct
tips: No need to go back to Act 1 or 2 now
Start looking from vendors and ground for 4-link chests for lvl 31
Pick up rares and sell them for Orb of Transmutation shards
Worth doing vaal side areas for vaal gems

steps: The Aqueduct ➞ Town ➞ The Dried Lake
The Dried Lake kill Voll, Emperor of Purity, get Crafting , if underleveled (27-28) keep clearing ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal
The Mines ➞ The Mines level 2 ➞ Deshret's spirit ➞ The Crystal Veins

The Crystal Veins get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint and Crafting ,![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to town get passive point then ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to Aspirant's plaza
Ascend ➞ ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Crystal Veins
Daresso's Dream ➞ The Grand Arena get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Crystal Veins
Kaom's Dream ➞ Kaom's Stronghold kill King Kaom get The Eye of Fury ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal vendor
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Grand Arena ➞ Kill Daresso, King of Swords, ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Crystal Veins
Turn in quests ➞ The Belly of the Beast ➞ The Belly of the Beast level 2 ➞ Kill Piety
The Belly of the Beast level 2 kill Piety (don't get hit by beam) ➞ The Harvest
The Harvest get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint
Kill Doedre Darktongue get Malachai's Lungs
Kill Maligaro, The Inquisitor get Malachai's Heart
Kill Shavronne of Umbra get Malachai's Entrails
Turn in quests to Piety ➞ Kill Malachai, The Nightmare ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal
Check vendors for 4-links, turn in quests ➞ The Ascent
The Ascent ➞ get Crafting in The Ascent, pull the lever next to The Resonator
tips: Don't farm tabula in aqueducts
Aim for 60%+ all Elemental Resistances, use the crafting bench (Orb of Transmutations)
Watch for items with 2 or + Elemental Resistances types
Get Delve nodes but don't do delve until later

steps: The Slave Pens ➞ kill Overseer Krow
Go to town ➞ talk to Lani free ring
The Control Blocks ➞ Get the Miasmeter ➞ Kill Justicar Casticus ➞ Oriath Square
Oriath Square ➞ The Templar Courts get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The Chamber of Innocence
Kill High Templar Avarius (Summon 10 packs each phase) avoid lasers
Go out take ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to town, talk to Bannon for Jewel and Flask (Silver is best)
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint back to The Chamber of Innocence ➞ The Torched Courts ➞ The Ruined Square
The Ruined Square ➞ get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint then go to The Ossuary
Get Sign of Purity and Crafting ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal town and vendor
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Ruined Square ➞ South for The Reliquary
Get 3xKitava's Torments check 4 corners of map
![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal town, turn in quest
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Ruined Square ➞ The Cathedral Rooftop ➞ kill Kitava, the Insatiable
tips: Granite flask is very good early
Pick up all small rare items (4 slots less) for Transmutation Shards
Level gems when loading into zones
Only do vaal side areas if you don't have vaal skill you want

steps: Clear The Twilight Strand ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal town
Vendor, buy missing gems ➞ The Coast
The Coast ➞ ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint skip side quest ➞ The Mud Flats
Kill The Dishonoured Queen for Eye of Conquest then go West ➞ Karui Fortifications
Karui Fortifications ➞ The Karui Fortress kill Tukohama, Karui God of War ➞ Karui Fortifications
Karui Fortifications ➞ The Ridge ➞ The Lower Prison
The Lower Prison get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint do trial ➞ Shavronne's Tower
Shavronne's Tower ➞ Go up all stairs ➞ kill Shavronne the Returned and Reassembled Brutus
Go to the Warden's Chamber, get Crafting ➞ Prisoner's Gate (not worth killing Abberath, the Cloven One now) ➞ The Western Forest (follow the road)
The Western Forest get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The Riverways
The Riverways get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The Wetlands
The Wetlands ➞ The Spawning Ground, kill Ryslatha, the Puppet Mistress
![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town, vendor place items into currency tab , turn in quests for 4-link helm
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Riverways ➞ The Southern Forest get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint
The Southern Forest ➞ The Cavern of Anger (ignore betrayal) ➞ The Beacon
The Beacon get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint get Crafting, do the pillar event
Click switch and the beacon, then run opposite direction, Weylam will instantly appear
Talk to weylam go to The Brine King's Reef ➞ kill The Brine King (if lazy or low on cold resist make portal to avoid lightning stage)
tips: Try to be resist capped (75%) by crafting in Hideout
If skills permit use rarety on kill support gem for better loot

steps: The Broken Bridge ➞ get Silver Locket for flask ➞ The Crossroads (don't forget beasts)
The Crossroads ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to town, do menagerie if beast gave something good
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint The Crossroads ➞ The Fellshrine Ruins ➞ The Crypt
The Crypt do trial get Crafting ➞ level 2 in Sarcophagus
Get Maligaro's Map, ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town, turn in quests
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Crossroads ➞ The Chamber of Sins, get Crafting and put in the Maligaro's Map ➞ Maligaro's Sanctum
Maligaro's Sanctum ➞ kill Maligaro, the Artist get Black Venom then ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal out
Turn in Black Venom and get Obsidian Key ➞ The Chamber of Sins level2
The Chamber of Sins level2 do the trial ➞ The Den
The Den get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The Ashen Fields
The Ashen Fields get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ Fortress Encampent
Fortress Encampent kill Greust, Lord of the Forest ➞ The Northern Forest ➞ ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to town turn in quests

![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint (Act 6) Prisoner's Gate ➞ The Valley of the Fire Drinker kill Abberath, the Cloven One (recommended around 1.6k life) ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town, turn in quest
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint (Back to Act 7) to The Northern Forest ➞ The Dread Thicket
The Dread Thicket get 7xFireflies ➞ Den of Despair and kill Gruthkul, Mother of Despair (if hardcore wait until later)
The Dread Thicket get rest 7xFireflies and Crafting, ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town
Turn in quests, ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Northern Forest
The Northern Forest ➞ The Causeway get crafting and ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint, do Alva to get her in hideout ➞ The Vaal City
If arrive and big hole follow ledge to West then North to ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint talk to Yeena

![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to town turn in quests ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to Aspirant's plaza (Dont forget to set Soul of Ralakesh in the pantheon for less bleeding damage)
Ascend (Don't forget Crafting)
Vendor ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Vaal City ➞ The Temple of decay
The Temple of decay ➞ The Temple of decay level 2 get Crafting
The Temple of decay level 2 ➞ Arakaali's Web, kill Arakaali, Spinner of Shadows
tips: Get granite flask
Beast worth doing
Keep enduring flasks ( worth 3-4 chaos beginning league)
LvL 50 start doing vaal areas again

steps: The Sarn Ramparts get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The Sarn Encampment
Vendor ➞ The Toxic Conduits
The Toxic Conduits ➞ Doedre's Cesspool ➞ The Cauldron , kill Doedre the Vile (stay melee range use granite flask)
Sewer Outlet ➞ get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint and crafting ➞ The Quay
The Quay get the Ankh of Eternity ➞ Resurection Site talk to clarissa and kill Tolman
The Quay ➞ The Grain Gate
The Grain Gate get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The Imperial Fields
The Imperial Fields follow path get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The Solaris Temple
The Solaris Temple get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The Solaris Temple level 2
The Solaris Temple level 2 ➞ Go in portal, kill Dawn, Harbinger of Solaris get Crafting
![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town turn in quests ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint The Solaris Temple
The Solaris Temple ➞ The Solaris Concourse get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The Harbour Bridge
The Harbour Bridge ➞ The Lunaris Concourse get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The Lunaris Temple
The Lunaris Temple get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The Lunaris Temple level 2
The Lunaris Temple level 2 ➞ Go in portal kill Dusk, Harbinger of Lunaris get crafting, ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town
Turn in quest ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Solaris Concourse
The Solaris Concourse ➞ The Harbour Bridge ➞ The Sky Shrine
The Sky Shrine, kill Solaris and Lunaris (keep moving avoid skills) ➞ The Blood Aqueduct
Can farm The Blood Aqueduct and do Delve
Go back to ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to The Lunaris Concourse (Act 8) ➞ The Bath House (act 8) to do Trial and get Crafting
Find The High Gardens inside The Bath House (act 8) ➞ The Pools of Terror, kill Yugul, reflection of terror, ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal town turn in quests
To up to The Descent ➞ keep going down ➞ The Vastiri Desert
The Vastiri Desert get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint and crafting ➞ find Storm Blade

![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town turn in quests (talk to sin + Petarus and Vanja) ➞ ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint back The Vastiri Desert ➞ The Oasis, kill Shakari ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal town
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint back to the vastiri desert ➞ The foothills (normally north)
The Vastiri Desert ➞ The Foothills get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint, ➞ The Boiling Lake ➞ kill The Basilisk get Crafting
![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town, ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Foothills ➞ find Calendar of Fortune ➞ The Tunnel
The tunnel do the trial get crafting ➞ get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ The quarry
The Quarry, get Crafting and ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint in middle go north ➞ The Refinery, kill General Adus , get Trarthan Powder

![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town turn in quests ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint back to The Quarry go West to ➞ Shrine of the winds, kill Garukhan, Queen of the Winds
![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town, turn in quests, ➞ ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Quarry ➞ The Belly of the Beast
The Belly of the Beast ➞ The Rotting Core ➞ The Black Core
Shavronne's Sorrow, kill Shavronne, Unbound ➞ back to The Rotting Core
Doedre's Despair, kill Doedre, Darksoul ➞ back to The Rotting Core
Maligaro's Misery, kill Maligaro, The Broken ➞ back to The Rotting Core, talk to sin
The Black Heart, kill The Depraved Trinity ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town, take ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to Oriath Docks
tips: Focus movement speed and life on items
Check prophecies
Don't forget to craft in hideout for resistances cap
Can farm The Blood Aqueduct and do Delve
Ziz farms The Blood Aqueduct for [2 hours].zone and gets a Tabula with humility cards
SSF go to act 1 get bunch of skill gems and 2 wands with 3 sockets to lvl skill gems, to later vaal a lvl 20/20 gem to get a lvl 21

steps: Go to The Cathedral Rooftop ➞ Cathedral Apex, save Bannon
Go back The Cathedral Rooftop ➞ The Ravaged Square

The Ravaged Square get ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint, make ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal on bridge before ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint, ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to town vendor ➞ take ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal back to The Ravaged Square
The Ravaged Square ➞ The Control Blocks ( if hc you can skip Vilenta is Rippy)
The Control Blocks , take ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint ➞ find holes in gates to skip with movement skill
Go in Arena kill Vilenta ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town
Turn in quests ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Ravaged Square ➞ The Ossuary
The Ossuary ➞ find Elixir of Allure, do the Trial ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town
Turn in quests ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Ravaged Square ➞ The Torched Courts
The Torched Courts ➞ The Desecrated Chambers take ![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint, get Crafting ➞ The Sancrum of Innocence
Kill Avarius, Reassembled, pick up The Staff of Purity, ![Town Portal](/images/portalscroll.png)Town Portal to town, vendor turn in quests
if lvl 68, do ascendency, if SC and want to rush to maps go ahead, if HC Strongly recommended to farm The Blood Aqueduct get ~lvl 70 then do ascendency
![Waypoint](/images/waypoint.png)Waypoint to The Ravaged Square , talk to Innocence ➞ The Canals
The Canals ➞ The Feeding Trough, get Crafting ➞ Altar of Hunger
Altar of Hunger, Kill Kitava, the Insatiable talk to Sin, take portal to Oriath
In Oriath, talk to Lani, get movement speed Crafting North West of city
